channel.title: Bisq 15.1 can't connect to Bitcoin network
channel.description:
Hello.
After the last whonix upgrade bisq 15.1 doesn’t seem to work. Bisq can’t connect to bitcoin network.

item.title: Bisq 15.1 can't connect to Bitcoin network
item.dc:creator: tuta
item.description:
I checked if you remove the --daoActivated=false from the instruction on whonix site - everything will work.

Read full topic
item.source: Bisq 15.1 can't connect to Bitcoin network

item.title: Bisq 15.1 can't connect to Bitcoin network
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Cannot connect to Bitcoin network with Bisq 15.1 in non-Whonix VM either.

Cannot connect to Bitcoin network with Bisq 15.1 in Debian VM either.

Therefore issue not caused by Whonix.

Please resolve as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

Read full topic
item.source: Bisq 15.1 can't connect to Bitcoin network
